name: syncspace
description: SyncSpace: A Community-Driven Social Network. Think Reddit meets Twitter

scripts.build: npm run build --w packages/shared && npm run build --w packages/server && npm run --w packages/socket && npm run build --w packages/client
scripts.build:client: npm run build --w packages/shared && npm run build --w packages/client
scripts.build:server: npm i --w packages/server && npm run build --w packages/shared && npm run build --w packages/server
scripts.build:socket: npm i --w packages/socket && npm run build --w packages/shared && npm run build --w packages/socket
